name: Makeup Games Top Fashion Makeover Design Game App
name_original: Makeup Games Top Fashion Makeover Design Game App
description:
Make up your model and decorate your entire luxury suite!!
FREE for a limited time!

Choose from skin tones, hairstyles, and eye colors, and then make up your model with gorgeous makeup, including lipstick, blush, eyeshadow and eyeliner in the most amazing new color palettes!

Dress up in hundreds of outfit combinations to finish your look. Shoes, pants, shirts, sunglasses, necklaces. earnings, bling jewelry and more.

Once you are happy with your model makeover, move into your luxury suite where you can decorate amazing bedrooms, cool living rooms and gorgeous kitchens! Tons and tons of awesome items for you to choose from! You won't believe the endless choices in this makeover app. Everything from puppies to boyfriends to glitter disco stairs!

Play now for free. All items unlocked!
Play Makeup Games™ today!!!
